findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: Owner has excessive privileges, including changing fees, max transaction amount, excluding from fee, enabling/disabling buy/sell limit, manual swap and send ETH to team, enabling/disabling swap and cooldown, changing _opsTeamWalletAddress.
